I'm heartbroken to learn of Grand Chief Cathy Merrick's sudden passing. 

As a fierce advocate for First Nations people and as the first female grand chief of the Assembly of Manitoba Chiefs, she changed lives and inspired generations.

Her legacy of fighting for justice and equity will live on. 

I‚Äôm sending my deepest condolences to her loved ones and all members of the Pimicikamak Cree Nation and the First Nations of Manitoba.

Starting this Fall, kids who go to school hungry were supposed to have free lunches.

Pierre Poilievre voted to deny free lunches to these kids. But, Justin Trudeau made a promise to parents and kids - and now he's broken it.

And yet he's congratulating himself for lunches kids won't actually get.
